modules.description: Generates runtime type representations from OCaml type definitions using the [@@deriving typerep] syntax. It produces a value of type Typerep.t for each defined type, supporting basic types and simple structures. This is used to inspect or serialize types at runtime, such as in debugging tools or serialization frameworks.

Provides a function to generate type representations for custom types, enabling runtime type information retrieval. Works with OCaml's type system and ppx syntax extensions to derive type metadata. Used to inspect and serialize types in metaprogramming scenarios.
